H0.text: Who composed the ballet ‘Swan Lake’. Ludwig van Beethoven

H1.text: Who composed the ballet ‘Swan Lake’. Frédéric Chopin

H2.text: Who composed the ballet ‘Swan Lake’. Johannes Brahms

H3.text: Who composed the ballet ‘Swan Lake’. Tchicovski

A4.text: Swan Lake is a ballet by Russian composer Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky

A5.text: The ballet Swan Lake is among the works composed by Pyotr Ilyich Tchaikovsky

A6.text: Tchaikovsky wrote some of the most popular concert and theatrical music in the classical repertoire, including the ballets Swan Lake and The Nutcracker
